title.en: From Acting Genius To Top Idol!

altTitles.en: Acting Genius, TOP Idol!

description.en: “The brilliant actor, famous Baekhyun, before he dies, encounters a miracle and travels back in time! But there’s nothing free about time travel. His lifespan ends at thirty, and he has only ten years left. To return as an actor and stay alive, he must become an ‘idol’! Experience the journey of the talented performance star as he rises to the top ranks of idols, an exciting story awaits!”

altTitles.en: Placebo Memories

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

title.en: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.ja: ハーレムより平穏を！異世界で静かにニート姫させてくれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Harem Yori Heion wo! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.en: More peace than a harem
More Peace than a Harem - In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace
I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World

description.en:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
description.ja:
エリートサラリーマン（ニート志望）、姫様にTS転生してオナ●ート生活…!!!?

ニートを夢見てFIREをした、エリートサラリーマン・岸辺。夢の生活も目前!!のはずが、車にひかれる寸前だった女の子を助けたことで死亡してしまう。そんな彼を憐れんだ自称神様が岸辺をニートができる異世界へと転生。気づけば超大国の姫様・アイリスになっていた!!!
超絶美少女で一切働く必要がなく、惰眠と自由とオナ●ーのし放題で岸辺は人生勝ち組!!…と確信していたが、ある問題が。この姫様、最高レベルの愛され体質（スキル？）みたいで、色々な女の子が姫様（元男）に迫られまくり……!!?


異世界で愛されまくって働かないメシが上手いか？を体験できる、羨ましすぎる異世界TSクソニートハーレム!!!!

altTitles.ja: ぼくとミモザの75日

altTitles.en: 75 Days of Me and Mimosa

description.en: Rindou Shuuto is the son of Yakuza boss Rindou Takeshi, the brutal and voracious head of the Rindou-gumi. Takeshi is likewise a heartless and abusive parent, very much angered by his son's timid nature, but Shuuto finds comfort in the companionship of his new bodyguard, the beautiful and mysterious Mimosa; whom he dubs as his "older sister". Later though, Shuuto walks in on his father apparently forcing himself onto Mimosa. Reaching his limit, Shuuto violently attacks his father with a knife, but it's Mimosa who swiftly finishes off the crime lord, protecting the young man. The two proceed to go on the run together....

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 美しいばけもの

altTitles.en: The Beautiful Deity

description.en:
The “Great God” is a god who takes the form of a beast and is said to bestow “blessings” on the land he visits.

A village in the mountains, where the tradition still exists, was suffering from heavy snowfall that never stops throughout the year. The residents believe that this is due to a lack of offerings to the “Great God,” so they make a decision.

They decided to offer a “slave boy” to the “Great God” as a “human sacrifice”....

A story of “boy” and “beast,” “blessing” and “curse.
description.ja:
獣の姿をして、訪れた土地に“祝福”を授けるとされる神、“大神様”。

その伝承が残る山間の集落は、一年中降りやむことのない豪雪に苦しめられていた。“大神様”への供物が足りないためだと考えた住民はとある決断を下す。

それは“奴隷の少年”を“人身御供”として、“大神様”へ差し出すことだった…。

“少年”と“獣”、そして“祝福”と“呪い”の物語。

title.en: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.ja: 英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With Mr. Hanabusa's Mouth
Hanabusa-kun Is Good with His Mouth - Licking, Sucking, and Slurping...

altTitles.zh-hk: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厲害~又能吸、又能舔

altTitles.zh: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厉害~又能吸、又能舔

description.en:
"Is this your first time? Would you like to borrow my mouth?" Coworkers Yuzuki and Himari are in for an exciting night when he offers to suck, lick, and slurp with this talented mouth. Will he make her cum for the first time? 

(Source: Coolmic)
description.ja: 自分本位な元カレのせいで、「おくち」で気持ちよくされたことのないOL・陽茉梨。やっと別れたのに、飲み会帰りに未練タラタラの元カレと鉢合わせ!?同僚の英くんが助けてくれたけど、「今カレのフリ」でキスされちゃった…！そのまま「俺と付き合います？」とホテルで迫られて――…おくちで愛されるのって、こんなに気持ちいいの…!?そして描き下ろしでは、英くんのおくちではなく×××が活躍っ!?　※この作品は過去、電子書籍「英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…１～６巻」に掲載されました。重複購入にご注意下さい。
description.zh-hk: 陽茉梨是一位OL，在和交往10年的前男友分手後，在公司酒席結束後遇到了糾纏不清的前男友，被年下同事英君給解圍。但對方卻吻了她，甚至當他假男友，就這樣到飯店被逼著說「要和我交往嗎？」然後用他火熱的嘴唇和舌頭親吻了陽茉梨……

altTitles.ja: 絶代武神～伝説の始まり～

description.en:
On the verge of death, I was saved by a group of elderly demon – level existences at the apex of cultivation. But I, Yeon-gang had too much potential in martial arts, and alas was kidnapped and forced to become their disciple… Join me as I desperately try my best to escape their grasp, and enter the world of Murim!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ja:
武林世家である四川唐門でこき使われあげくに捨てられた少年・燕康。 自称「絶世達人」の老人3人組に拾われ弟子になるも、修行と言う名の家事ばかり！ やっと武功を教えてもらうことになるも、基本の以気御剣（いきごけん）”さえできなかった！ 武神の伝説は始まったばかり…！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ko:
은거고수 삼인방 비돈, 독안, 광두! 

그들이 제자를 키우기 시작한다.

"너는 왜 가장 기본인 이기어검조차 못하냐?"


기본이나 다름없는 이기어검도 못해서 구박받는 제자 소연강!

소연강과 세사부의 전설이 시작된다!

적하 작가의 명작 무협 소설 <절대무신>이 웹툰으로 돌아왔다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)
description.ru:
Три великих мастера-затворника: Бидон, Тоган и Кванду, - взяли на воспитание ученика по имени Со Ён Ган.

-Почему ты не можешь освоить элементарные приёмы с мечом?

Вот так начинается история об ученике-неудачнике - Со Ён Гане.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%88%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0/2498)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/58384)

title.en: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo, Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in Another World, But For Some Reason No One Wants to Leave.

altTitles.ja: 異世界で孤児院を開いたけど、なぜか誰一人巣立とうとしない件

altTitles.ru: Как открыть приют в другом мире!

altTitles.en: Isekai Orphanage

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 고아원을 열었지만, 어째서인지 아무도 독립하려 하지 않는다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界开了孤儿院，但不知为何没有一个人想离开

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Kojiin wo hiraitakedo nazeka darehitori sudatou to shinaiken

altTitles.en: I Opened an Orphanage in a Different World, But Why Doesn't Anyone Want to Graduate?

description.en: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?
description.id: Masatsugu dibawa ke dunia lain dalam panggilan pahlawan dan akhirnya menjadi bagian dari kasta terendah. anak ini, yang tidak memiliki apa-apa selain keterampilan dasar, disuruh mengelola panti asuhan penuh gadis-gadis cantik! Tapi, hari-hari menyebalkan nya baru saja di mulai ketika ia menemukan bangunan di reruntuhan, dan ia juga harus membayar utang besar mantan direktur! Dan tidak itu saja, dia tidak punya waktu untuk beristirahat dari semua sampah mengancam panti asuhan! Apakah Masatsugu dan para anak yatim bisa melindungi rumah mereka yang berharga?

description.en:
“Those wearing armor shall never take off their arms, will never die, and will live in pain.”

With a witch’s curse, the ‘Cursed Knights’ began to roam the world.

And Enoch, a boy who encounters one, is about to discover what happens to him.

altTitles.en: Human Card

altTitles.ja: 人間カード

description.en: Mamoru, a mediocre college student, discovers an item of darkness while searching for the missing father of his childhood friend, Yuuka. This item is a "human card" which can trap people on a single sheet of paper for buying and selling. The horrific human trading suspense now begins!

altTitles.en: Cage on the Water
Mates Above the Waters

description.ko:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

altTitles.ja: 獣王と薬草

altTitles.en: Beast King & Medicinal Herb

description.en: Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

title.en: Hanabi wa Samenai Yume wo miru

altTitles.ja: 花火は醒めない夢をみる

altTitles.en: Olivia and the Neverending Dream

description.en: Olivia, the daughter of a duke, is betrayed by her fiancé, Crown Prince Luke, and is publicly executed. However, the moment Olivia thinks she has lost her life, she wakes up as Hanabi, a high school girl in a different world: Japan. What's more, it seems that Hanabi is being bullied at school...? The story of a duke's daughter's rise to power is about to begin!
description.ja:
公爵令嬢が転生したらいじめられっ子JKだった件。
婚約者・ルークに裏切られ、公開処刑となったオリビア。…のはずが目が覚めるとそこは異世界で、女子高生・鏑木花火になっていた！ 花火は皆からいじめられていたようで、学校に行くとクラスから標的にされてしまう。しかもそこに現れたのは、ルークに瓜二つのクラスメイト・押野で…？

---
被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！
description.zh-hk: 被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！

description.en:
Rin Ishikawa, 16 years old, the "talent'' that will revolutionize the boxing world has begun to awaken in the north.

Rin is a very popular and mischievous person. He was raised by his mother and grandparents in a small town in Hokkaido.

Now, he has dropped out of high school and is about to embark on his journey.
Without thiniking about his future, he decide to go to Tokyo. 

Rin, little did he know that he would leave his name in the history of boxing.

title.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

title.en: The Baby Saint Wants to Destroy the World!

altTitles.en: The Baby Saint Wants to Destroy the World!
Baby Saintess Wants to Destroy the World!

altTitles.fa: بچه قدیس میخواد دنیا رو نابود کنه!

altTitles.ja: 赤ちゃん聖女は世界を滅ぼしたい！

description.en:
The perpetual cycle of reincarnation, the recurring tragic deaths. Lucyphela, a formidable witch who became tired of life after enduring 99 lifetimes. She aims to halt the cycle by causing the world's demise.

Nevertheless... Upon awakening, she discovers her rebirth as the 'Baby Saint,' fated to rescue this world?

Nurtured by the very priests who were formerly her adversaries. Menaced by former companions who were once her apprentices!

Can the Baby Saint provoke the world's ruin unscathed?

---
In her 99th life, Archwitch Lucifella was known as the scourge of the continent, wreaking chaos and havoc over the land. Looking to end her continuous rebirth cycle, she attempted to destroy the world and failed upon being defeated by the pope. But for her 100th life, she was reborn as the opposite of what she stood for—the baby saint prophesied to bring peace! Under such circumstances, can Lucifella bring ruin to this world instead of blessings and break her endless cycle?

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.

altTitles.ja: 未だ亡くなっていない人

altTitles.en: Wives Who have not Yet Passed Away
Wives Who Has Not Yet Passed Away

description.en: Haruka Kawarazaki, a young man aspiring to be a manga artist, and Mayuko Kawarazaki, a beautiful woman to whom everyone looks back. They live in a room in a flat, share a meal every night and lay on each other's skin. But they are not husband and wife. A woman whose heart has been broken and a young man who knows it but continues their relationship - a love suspense about a forbidden relationship that you can't stop even when you know it's wrong.
description.ja:
兄は逝き、義姉は壊れ、僕は溺れた

漫画家を目指す青年･河原崎遥と、誰もが振り返る美女･河原崎繭子。共に暮らし、毎夜、食事を共にし、肌を重ねる。しかし、二人は夫婦ではない。繭子は、遥の義姉。死んだ兄の妻なのだ。心が壊れてしまった女と、それを知りながら関係を続ける男―――
description.vi: Chuyện xoay quanh anh chàng Kawarazaki Haruka có ước mơ được trở thành một tác giả truyện tranh và Kawarazaki Mayuko, một người phụ nữ xinh đẹp khiến cho bất kỳ người đàn ông nào cũng đều không khỏi phải ngước nhìn. Hai người họ hiện đang cùng chung sống trong một căn hộ, nấu ăn cho nhau và thậm chí còn làm cả những chuyện chăn gối dù rằng cả hai thực ra không phải vợ chồng. Một mối quan hệ cấm kỵ giữa người phụ nữ đã tan nát cõi lòng và chàng thanh niên dù biết tất cả nhưng vẫn quyết định nhắm mắt làm ngơ mà tiếp tục duy trì mối quan hệ hiện tại.
description.es-la: Haruka Kawarazaki, un joven que aspira a ser Mangaka, y Mayuko Kawarazaki, una hermosa mujer a la que todos miran. Viven en una misma habitación, comparten una comida cada noche y se acuestan sobre la piel del otro. Pero no son marido y mujer. Una mujer con el corazón roto y un joven que lo sabe pero que continúa su relación: un thriller de amor sobre una relación prohibida que no puedes detener aunque sepas que está mal.
description.pt-br: A história segue o jovem aspirante a mangaká, **Haruka Kawarazaki**, e a deslumbrante, **Mayuko Kawarazaki**, que atrai a atenção de todos. Os dois vivem juntos em um apartamento, compartilham refeições todas as noites e satisfazem todos seus desejos carnais sobre a cama. No entanto, eles não são um casal. Uma mulher cujo coração foi partido e um jovem que sabe disso, mas que continua a sua relação. *― Um suspense romântico que retrata um relacionamento proibido que não pode ser interrompido, mesmo sabendo que é errado.*

altTitles.en: MazinSaga

altTitles.ja: マジンサーガ

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

title.en: That Villain's Life, I'll Live It Once

altTitles.ko: 그 악녀 인생, 제가 한번 살아 볼게요

altTitles.en: The Villainess's Life, I'll Try Living It
I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

Summoned to another world and living as a mediocre healer, Sido, by a stroke of luck, begins to hear the voices of the gods. It turns out that the gods have been playing a long-term game with humans?!

title.en: How to Gracefully Divorce a Dragon

altTitles.en: How to Divorce a Dragon Beautifully

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

altTitles.ja: かみながしじま ～輪廻の巫女～

description.en: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
description.ru: Старшеклассница Аманэ Мико - известная Мико в своем родном городе. Однажды она попадает в странное дорожно-транспортное происшествие и обнаруживает, что просыпается в мире, наполненном гротескно выглядящими монстрами, бродящими вокруг...! Постоянный страх нападения этих монстров! Однако, чтобы разгадать тайны этого мира, Мико продвигается сквозь этот мир отчаяния. Сотрудничая с другими выжившими девушками, чтобы сбежать с этого уединенного острова в далеком море в этом паническом хорроре!

altTitles.ja: カジノグイ

description.en:
Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!

title.en: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kaineko

altTitles.ja: 愛が重すぎるうちのヤンデレ飼い猫

altTitles.en: My love is too heavy, my yandere pet cat

altTitles.pt-br: Meu amor é muito pesado, minha gata de estimação yandere

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kai Neko

title.en: Oni Juurou to Nin no Ryuu Sagashi

altTitles.ja: 鬼十郎と妊の龍探し

altTitles.ja-ro: Oni Jūrō to Nin no Ryū Sagashi

title.en: The Red Over There Is Our Home

altTitles.en: 紅色的那邊是我們的家

description.en:
A very short comic about the city and the stars.  
Read left to right.

altTitles.ja: 創作百合の落書きや漫画まとめ

altTitles.ja-ro: Sousaku Yuri no Rakugaki ya Manga Matome

altTitles.en: Collection of Yuri Sketches and Manga

description.en:
A collection of artwork and short manga released by artist Tokuwotsumu.

Tokuwotsumu routinely publishes manga and artwork featuring the characters from their other series on social media. Tokuwotsumu then packages this artwork and manga up in these chapters for official release on Pixiv.

A must-read for fans of Tokuwotsumu's other series!

title.en: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman

altTitles.zh: 我不可能和纸片人谈恋爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Bu Keneng He Zhi Pian Ren Tan Lian'ai

description.en: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

altTitles.ja: 光が死んだ夏

altTitles.en: The Summer Hikaru Died

altTitles.de: Der Sommer, in dem Hikaru starb

altTitles.th: หน้าร้อนที่ฮิคารุจากไป

altTitles.pt-br: O verão em que Hikaru morreu

altTitles.es: El verano en que Hikaru murió

altTitles.it: L’estate in cui Hikaru è morto

description.en:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...
description.fr: Hikaru et Yoshiki sont deux amis d'enfance qui ont grandi ensemble dans un hameau reculé. Mais un jour, les doutes qu'éprouvait Yoshiki depuis quelque temps se confirment : depuis sa disparition en forêt, six mois plus tôt, Hikaru a été remplacé par... "autre chose". Malgré cet effroyable constat, Yoshiki refuse d'être séparé de son ami. Il fait alors le choix de poursuivre son quotidien aux côtés de cet "être" à l'image parfaite de Hikaru. Mais au même moment, d'étranges incidents se produisent çà et là dans le village...
description.es-la:
“Así que, Hikaru ya no está… Si eso es verdad, entonces…” 

Yoshiki y Hikaru son dos chicos que viven en cierto pueblo. Tienen la misma edad y siempre han estado juntos mientras crecían. Pero, un día, Yoshiki se da cuenta que “una cosa” tomó el lugar de Hikaru. Incluso después de saber eso, Yoshiki aún quiere que estén juntos. Y así, su vida con esa “cosa” que se parece a su amigo comienza. 

Al mismo tiempo, incidentes extraños continúan ocurriendo en el pueblo...

altTitles.en: Mr. Nobunaga's Young Bride

altTitles.ja: ノブナガ先生の幼な妻

altTitles.zh: 信长老师有个萝莉老婆

description.en: The manga centers on the relationship between a middle school teacher who has a knack for gal games and a 14-year-old "perfect prospective wife" who is an expert on the Sengoku period.
description.ja: 「ある日突然、自分のことを大好きな女の子が現れるはず」。そんなギャルゲー展開を夢見続けてきた中学教師・信永くん。そんな彼の元に、戦国時代から14歳の姫が子作りをしにやってきた!? 彼の妻を自称する14歳の少女・帰蝶。彼女は戦国時代からやってきたらしく、信永=織田信長と勘違いし、子づくりを迫るが…!? 14歳=手を出したら一発アウト!! しかも、戦国姫も、教え子も、なんでみなオレに迫ってくるんだ!? 赤面女子のマエストロ・紺野あずれの最新作はギャルゲ脳な教師と戦国脳な姫が巻き起こす、年の差ラブコメ!!

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

altTitles.en: Three Part Struggle
Three Way Scramble
Three-way Struggle

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

title.en: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai

altTitles.en: My Wife Has No Emotion

altTitles.ja: 僕の妻は感情がない

description.en: A story about the humble marriage of a corporate slave salaryman and a housework robot.

altTitles.en: The Princess Is Evil

description.en:
I may be a witch who is over 300 years old, but I died by the hand of the human I trusted. I thought I’d be stuck in the soul world, but I reincarnated as a princess of a Royal Palace where we kill each other. Since it became like this, in any case, I should become the Queen. “You. Be my subordinate.” I thought everyone would be afraid of me if I did this. “Can’t I touch it once? Everyone would be jealous of me because I patted your head once.” …What nonsense is this?“ Again. Do it again, since it’s cute.” But they’ve started to show me so much affection to the point that they seemed to have all gone mad as a group. …I’ll be able to become the Queen, right?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10170/)
description.ko:
나는 삼백 살이 넘는 마녀이지만, 믿었던 인간에게 배신당해 죽었다.
꼼짝없이 영혼계에 붙잡혀 있을 줄 알았는데 
서로가 서로를 죽이는 황실에 황녀로 환생했다.

이렇게 된 이상 내가 황제가 돼야겠다. 
“너. 내 부하가 대라.”

이렇게 했으니까 모두 나를 두려워하겠지, 생각했는데.

“한 번만 만져주면 안 돼? 네가 머리를 쓰다듬어줬다고 하면 모두가 부러워할 거야.”
…뭐야. 왜 이래. 

“더 해 줘. 귀여우니까.”
description.zh: 因被背叛而致死的魔女，在积蓄力量等待复活时，穿越成了以互相残杀，争夺皇位为铁律的皇室公主。 正准备惨烈地加入皇位争夺时，身边的人却反常地迷恋上我？ “太可爱了，能摸我一下吗？只要你抚摸一下我的头，所有人都会羡慕死我的。”
description.es-la: Soy una bruja de más de trescientos años, pero fui traicionada por un humano en quien confiaba y morí. Pensé que estaría atrapada en el mundo de los espíritus, pero me reencarné como una princesa en la familia imperial dónde matan a los demás. Mientras esto suceda, me convertiré en emperatriz. *Y tienes que conquistar el continente y vengarte. Entonces, como una bruja, se comportó muy mal y muy malvada. “ustedes mis subordinados me obedecen”. Sometió a los príncipes con un poder abrumador. Pensé que todos me tendrían miedo porque hice esto. “Lo recogí específicamente para ti. Cómelo o tíralo a la basura”. “¿No puedes tocarme una sola vez? Todos me envidiarian si dijeras que me acariciarias el pelo ” …. qué. Vamos. ¿No es esta la familia imperial donde se está llevando a cabo una lucha de muerte y sangre? Así que es natural que intenten matarme, ¿verdad? “Puedes hacer más. Porque eres linda “. “Puede hacer cualquier cosa”. “Alguien que es linda incluso si mata gente no dejará de serlo ….” Sin embargo, como grupo, me están mostrando su afecto ciego hasta el punto de que me pregunto si están locos. “¿Cómo te sentirías si fueras doscientos años más joven?” ¿Podré llegar hacer la emperatriz?.

title.en: Kikanshita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 帰還したS級冒険者のクエスト生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Kikan Shita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu

altTitles.en: The Regressed S-Class Adventurer's Quest Life

description.en:
Dungeons began to suddenly appear throughout the world
Kyomi Aki became an S-Class adventurer assassin with his tremendous speed.
Unfortunately, assassins were considered as a failure class.
His class was becoming harder and harder to master the more he advanced.
The class itself had a low attack power and mana, so he needed to always rely on someone else.
One day, Aki encountered a dangerous monster that could wipe out the entirety of humanity.
He somewhat managed to subjugate the monster, but lost his life in the process.
Suddenly, he awoke and found himself having regressed 20 years into the past.
He also received an additional “Bonus Quest” as a reward for solo killing the monster.
With his knowledge from his previous lifetime and this “quest,” Aki resolved himself to redo everything to become the strongest adventurer.

The game has turned into reality and a “Great Migration” has occurred all over the Earth. As a top-tier ranker thanks to massive in-game purchases, along with the special privileges from the game administrator “Nel,” I got a new lease on life. I even inherited the inventory of my max-level game character as it was prior to the game shutting down. From cash items that no one else can acquire, to special items of legendary grade that everyone desires! Now, everything that everyone wants unfolds infinitely within my inventory. Please, let it be known to only you! My inventory is… abnormal.

altTitles.en: The Royal Frozen

description.en: At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…
description.fr: À l’âge de vingt ans, Seol Mudok, un maître de l’épée, est devenu le seigneur du Palais des glaces de la mer du Nord. Plongé dans le désespoir après la mort de son amante, il découvre qu’avec la fleur légendaire, le « Lotus de l’Amour », sa défunte amante s’est réincarné. Dans sa quête, il descend dans un autre monde…

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm: Part 4

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!

altTitles.en: Do Your Best, Douki-chan

altTitles.ja: がんばれ同期ちゃん

description.en: "Cute" love story of girls who will stop at nothing but making the eyeless protagonist theirs!

altTitles.zh: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级

altTitles.en: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
Rebirth Without Being the Licking King, I Use Cash to Level Up

altTitles.vi: Trọng Sinh Không Làm Chạn Vương, Tôi Một Mình Nạp Game Thăng Cấp

description.en: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title.en: BanG Dream! - It's Not Ran, But "Master", Right? (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 蘭じゃなくて、ご主人様でしょ

description.en: A Moca x Ran Doujin

altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

altTitles.en: The Cost of Violence
Price of Violence

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.
